\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{xparse}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{mdframed}

\definecolor{watermelon}{HTML}{B4Da55}
\definecolor{candy}{HTML}{f42069}

\mdfdefinestyle{debugstyle}{
  frametitlebackgroundcolor = watermelon,
  linecolor = candy,
  linewidth = 2pt
}

% \newenvironment{esbox}[2][\textwidth]
\NewDocumentEnvironment{esbox}{ O{\textwidth} m }
{% begin code
  \begin{minipage}[t]{#1}
  \begin{mdframed}[style=debugstyle, frametitle={#2}]
}
{ % enddef
  \end{mdframed}
  \end{minipage}%
}%
